title: Help ID this Typeface ... Please
content:
Can anyone help me identify this typeface?

Thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [theMountainCompany.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20091207085649/http:/typophile.com/files/theMountainCompany.gif) | 1.88 KB |
author: bjk

comments.content: this looks just like [Arete Mono](http://web.archive.org/web/20091207085649/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/t26/arete-mono/arete-mono/); the M in the logo has been modified.
Yes, that appears to be the case. Thank you for your help!
